title: Senior Product Manager
qualified: Customer centric: you want to solve a problem, you want to deliver value, you care about user behaviours and user experience, and you pay attention to detail.

Collaboration & Communication: you can drive cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery, you can articulate product ideas, features and requirements with a triple vision: user experience, business, tech.
Data driven: define and monitor success metrics and KPI of your product and team, to help decision making and prioritization.
Organization: build a roadmap, and the backlog of tasks and lead execution within an Agile / Scrum / SDLC framework.
